reviews.text:
We had a record breaking rainfall the day after my pool was cleaned. Then, we had more rain on the weekend. My pool was as blue as could be! It’s a Christmas miracle. No, our technician Chris Martin is a miracle! 😉

Claffey Pools and Chris have been the best pool service we have hired. Chris is faithfully here on our clean day every week. He puts in the time and effort to ensure our pool is looking good and functioning well. When we have had issues with our pool, the service team has pulled thro

Jason, Kyle, and Duffy were an absolute pleasure to work with. They not only answered all our questions but also went above and beyond to ensure we felt confident throughout the process. Everything was handled promptly and professionally, and they were always responsive when we reached out. Their insight and expertise were truly invaluable as we repaired our pool. We’re grateful for their support and look forward to working with Claffey again in the future.

The entire process, from start to finish, was fantastic. Everyone involved, Jasen, Mike, Sue, and all the others, were pleasant and professional. The pool turned out to be as beautiful as expected. Claffey built our pool 22 years ago and we made another good decision to have Claffey replaster the pool.

So glad I called Claffey to do repairs on my pool! Jason and Kyle were awesome. The attention to detail was superb….and I’m pretty picky!
Thank you for taking pride in your work! Awesome job!!

Talk about a total transformation! Claffey took our dated and run down back yard and turned it into a beautiful oasis. They remodeled our existing pool and built a new cabana. No detail was too small and every step was overseen with great care.  We were so grateful for Shawn. His amazing attention to detail and availability are truly invaluable.  He made this very long (9 months) project tolerable.  Would highly recommend Claffey, Shawn, and every worker who contributed for any project.
